"I wonder what the people here are like?".

"I should probably head back".
Sarah: "Why? You have powers now! Why would you want to stop?".
"My sister, she is probably worried about me".
Sarah: "Ah, a sister. Dont worry about it! Lets go".

She starts to drag Karen back to the sidewalk, but then she stops, "right, guess we cant go naked, well, we COULD, but, you might not be ready for that".
Sarah has their clothes reappear on them as well as some masks.

"What are the masks for?".
Sarah: "For you, don't want anyone to recognize us. Its a pain to erase certain memories and again, your new. You'll feel more comfortable if no one sees your face".
"I guess.....".
Sarah: "Then its settled", she says, taking her by the hand and leading her to the street.

Sarah runs out into the middle of the road, "I love being out so late at night! Barely anyone else is around! Its like we have the city to ourselves!".
121111112.title: Staying out late.

choices: Sarah can go first, she has done this before.
Karen, she is still new, she could use the practice.
1211111121.content:
Then they hear engines, a lot of them. They look up the street and see several motorcycles heading towards them. The motorcycles start to circle them as they reached the girls. 1 of the motorcycles stops right in front of them.

"Well well, what do we have here? What are 2 young cute girls doing out so late? Dont you know how dangerous it can get at night?".

Karen backs up to Sarah, (W-what are we going to do?)
Sarah puts an arm on her shoulder. (We'll be fine! Remember? We have powers! We just found our first play things of the night!). Karen looks at her.....and smiles.
Sarah: (You want to go first? Or should I start?).
1211111121.title: Some people show up.

12111111211.content:
Sarah walks towards the man that stopped.

Leader: Now now, no need to be in such a rush, why don't you remover your mask first? Then the 2 of you can spend all night with us".

Sarah doesn't respond, instead, she simply raises her hand and points it towards him. He starts to laugh, but before he could say anything, a yellow pulse emanates from her hand, strikes him, and the rest of his gang. This pulse knocks the men off of their motorcycles, the clash and banging of metal on road fills the air.

The leader and his men are unharmed as they get up and angrily look at them.

Leader: What the hell did you do?
Sarah doesn't answer and Karen is nervous.

As the men close in on them, Sarah turns to Karen, "don't worry, nothing bad is going to happen to us".

With her hand still pointed towards the leader, she snaps her fingers and he freezes in place. She than says 1 word, "attack". The leader then rushes and tackles the guy that was closest to him. This freaks the others out as they freeze in place. Shouting, panicking, and confusion are all around the 2 masked girls, but Sarah is still calm.

Picking someone at random, her hand faces towards her next victim as she focuses on him. Another snap, and he too freezes in place, then starts to scream. The others look at him, except for the leader and the guy he is currently attacking. The man begins to change. His skin turns a bright red as a pair of horns, black wings, and a tail appear on him. He then starts to shrink as his ass juts out and he grows a pair of huge breasts. The demon girl goes over to her "mistress" and asks what is it that she wants her to do. Her mistress replies, "have fun".

The demon grabs 1 of her former comrades and swallows him whole. The remaining men flee in terror, but are stopped when Sarah erects a barrier around them.

Sarah: You aren't going anywhere. You started this, and I'm going to finish it". She then turns to Karen, "you don't have to just stand there. Join in on the fun! These bastards deserve it!".

Karen nervously takes aim at 1 of the men, (w-what do I do?). She focuses on the 1st thing that she can think and "fires". The invisible attack hits the man and he starts transforming. His hair turns yellow and forms curls as it grows out. His body then starts to shrink as his arms and legs turn to stubs as a bow and blue and white dress appear on him. Karen had changed him into a doll.
"W-what have I done!?"
Sarah places a hand on her shoulder, "don't worry about it. These people are bad men. Who knows what else they have done over their lives before they ran into us".

Sarah and the demon girl finish off the rest of the men by transforming and devouring them. Sarah lifts the barrier. Grabbing 1 of Karen's hands, she leads her away from the scene.

"We can't leave them like that, can we??
Sarah: I've already considered that. In a few hours it'll be like nothing happened. They'll change back, even yours, and turn themselves over to the police. I may take my fun a little farther than I should, but I fix it in the end.
".....Really?".
Sarah: ....Yeah, why?
"We didn't clean up that place we were at before".
Sarah: .....oops, well, no harm done there. But enough of that, where to now?
12111111211.title: Sarah takes charge.

13.content: The rich girl, girl that is full of herself, etc.....
13.title: Tiffany.

131.content:
Tiffany arrives on a stormy Friday night. With school starting the following Monday, she is guided to her room by the owner of the place, Jackie.

She puts her suitcase and opens it up. It looks like any ordinary suitcase thats filled with clothes.

But thats not all thats in it.

Digging deeper into her bag, she pulls out something.

A blue stick with a green circular gem attached at the top, thats what she pulled out.

"Its always easier using one of these things, too bad I have to keep it hidden".

She backs up, then points the stick at her bed. The gem glows, then her clothing flies out of the suitcase. The doors of the nearby dresser and closet open and the flying clothes put themselves away.

Tiffany is not just some rich girl, she is also a witch.

Now on her bed, "*sigh*, why do I have to live in a place like this? "It'll be a good experience for you". "You should see what more of the world looks like"......Whatever.....These next few years are going to be long......".
131.title: Tiffany the Witch

choices: Casts a spell from inside her room.
1311.content:
The following day.....

Tiffany wakens to shouting just outside of her room.

"...hmmm? What? Who the hell is making all that racket?".

Getting out of bed, only in a shirt and pair of panties, and picks up her wand that was on a nightstand by her bed.

"Whoever is outside better have a good explanation for waking me up so early.....

What does she do?
1311.title: An annoying wake up call

13111.content:
And finds herself in the middle of an argument between five girls.

Girl 1: I know you took it! Give it back! The only ones I showed my new necklace to was my friend here, and the 3 of you who just happened to pass by!
(Average size, average breasts, short brown hair and brown eyes).

Girl 3: Necklace? I don't know what your talking about! Why would I take some cheap piece of junk from someone like you?
(Long yellow hair, tall, large breasts, and blue eyes).

Girl 1: What!?
Girl 4: And besides, do you have any proof that we took it?
(Medium length black hair, average height, average breasts, black eyes).

Girl 2: L-let's just go, Amanda.....
(Long Brown hair, green eyes, average height, above average breasts).

Amanda: No, Heather, I wont let them get away with taking whats mine!

Girl 5: And like Jill said, can you prove it?
(short red hair and black eyes with a below average chest and slightly taller than average)

Amanda: .....
Girl 3: Maybe you shouldn't leave stuff sitting out, who knows who could just walk in and take something.

The three of them start laughing.

Girl 3: Come, Jill, Vicki, lets go.
Jill&Vicki: Yes, Sarah.
Amanda: Oh no, your not leaving until you give it back!

Tiffany, who was enjoying a nice dream just a few minutes ago is annoyed and ticked off. What does she do?
13111.title: The situation beyond the door.

131111.content:
It was at this point that Sarah, the apparent leader of the 3, noticed Tiffany.

Sarah: .....And who are you? I don't....oh, you must be the new girl.....Whats with that look? Do you know who I am!?
"You woke me up".
Sarah: Huh?
"I HATE being woken up over something as stupid as this.
Amanda: Stupid? That necklace was given to me by my mom!
"I don't care".
Sarah: See? No one cares about you silly little necklace.
"No.....".
Sarah: What?
"I don't care about this. I don't care if you stole it or not. All I care about is that the stunt that you 3 pulled led to me getting up early.....".
Jill: So what?
Vicki: Yeah, just what are you going to do about it?
".....*snap*....."

With her wand in her hand, she points it at the closest 1, Vicki.

What does she do to her?
131111.title: Target the three resbonsible.

1311111.content:
Vicki: R-really? What are you going to do with that toy?
"I'm going to make it so that I can sleep without hearing your petty little fight".
Sarah: And just how are you going to do that with that cheap piece of plastic junk?
".....Cheap.....You did NOT just call my wand cheap junk.....".
Sarah: And what are you going to do about it?

The Gem on Tiffany's wand begins to glow as she points it away from Vicki and towards Sarah. "Silence!", she shouts. The gem glows even brighter and then stops.

Vicki: What was that?
Jill: .....J-just a trick, meant to surprise us, right, Sarah?

Sarah doesn't answer.

All of the girls look at her and gasp.

Sarah's mouth was gone.

Then with a quick wave of the wand, the mouths of Vicki and Jill vanish as well.

"Maybe now I can get some sleep!".

She then remembers the other 2 and glances at them. Amanda was staring in shock as Heather hides behind her.
Amanda: W-what are you?
"....."

What will Tiffany do to these 2 girls after shes done with the other 3? Will she wipe their memories? Or will she let them remember?
1311111.title: Silence.

14.content: The tall smart atheletic girl that likes to drink.
14.title: Jackie.

info.brief_description: A boarding house is about to get a new tenant.
info.description:
The main character arrives at the boarding house that he/she will be staying at while they attend their classes.

No m/m
No serious pain. No death. Though monsters, bandits, etc are an exception.
No explicit stuff like gore, blood, hard vore, things like that.
I can edit and delete as I see fit.
You CAN end. But give the option of continuing beforehand.
The main character can be changed. As can the viewpoint, 1st/3rd person.
Gender, name, age, and the school are picked by you.
Watch entries. Doesn't have to be perfect. Just readable.

Everything else is fine.
